'''v0.11.2 alpha''' is a minor update to ''[[Minecraft Pocket Edition]]'' released exclusively on Windows Phone. No fixes, modifications, additions or removals on this version were documented. This version includes all changes and fixes from [[Pocket Edition v0.11.0 alpha|v0.11.0]] and [[Pocket Edition v0.11.1 alpha|v0.11.1]] for Windows Phone.
